title: Shafted
description: "Wow, very sexy, couldn't stop reading this. Read it twice. Where is the sequel?" Karen Boyle, Herts "I was screaming out, 'no, don't do it girl!' Really thrilling." Jason, Wisconsin "My kind of book. Kinky but not too extreme, great story..." Louise, Bath An erotic thriller with an earth shattering climax. When London lass Alex Osborne inherits her batty aunt's wreck of a country house, she immediately falls for the sexy builder she hires to restore it. Yet when his wife appears on the scene, Alex gradually begins to realise that she's getting a lot more than she bargained for in this steamy story of lust and deceit with one hell of a climax.FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Rachae...TWITTER: https://twitter.com/R_Hayden_Author
author: Rachael Hayden
